meanings.definition: The act of discontinuing a session of a legislative body without dissolving it.
meanings.sent1: The prorogation of the meeting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The prorogation of the parliament was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: During the prorogation, the lawmakers played a game of charades.
meanings.sent4: The prorogation of the assembly left a void in the legislative process.
meanings.sent5: The prorogation felt like hitting pause on a movie scene.

meanings.definition: The act of postponing or delaying something.
meanings.sent1: We had to announce the prorogation of the event due to bad weather.
meanings.sent2: The prorogation of the project caused a delay in the timeline.
meanings.sent3: The prorogation of the decision led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her prorogation of the task felt like hitting the snooze button on an alarm.
meanings.sent5: The prorogation made the deadline seem like a distant dream.
